renderer::AlphaFunction

renderer::AlphaFunction Namespace Reference

Alpha functions. More...


Enumerations

enum  {
  ZERO, ONE, DST_COLOR, ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR,
  DST_ALPHA, ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA, SRC_COLOR, ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR,
  SRC_ALPHA, ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA, SRC_ALPHA_SATURATE
}

Detailed Description

All colors are referred as clamped to [0,1] Blend operator is always + (as blending is mostly left compatibility)
